content: In the heart of Stenograd, where governance is measured by the cold logic of the Behavioral Compliance Index, the sudden death of its architect, Marek Halden, sends invisible tremors through the city’s seamless control. When Oksana Lintz, desperate to patch mounting system failures, secretly restores deleted citizens—known as “ghosts”—the city reels as these untracked individuals reappear and expose cracks in the all-seeing order. As confusion and unrest ignite public protests, a burned privilege ledger surfaced by Lenart Kova reveals the Council’s hidden exceptions, fueling fury over corruption and favoritism. With the BCI unraveling and officials scrambling, the once-erased citizens rally and force a public tribunal, confronting leaders with testimonies of disappearances and abuses. As secrets spill and factions splinter, Stenograd teeters on the edge of transformation, driven by the courage of those long rendered invisible.
